meanings.definition: A device used to swat flies.
meanings.sent1: I grabbed the flyswatters to get rid of the pesky flies in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different types of flyswatters to help keep insects away.
meanings.sent3: As a joke, my friend tried to use the flyswatters to catch a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her swift hand with the flyswatters was like a ninja's precision in battle.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flyswatters hanging on the wall made the room look playful.
